暈.definition: dizzy; halo; ring around moon or sun

暈倒.definition: to faint; to swoon; to black out; to become unconscious

暈場.definition: to faint from stress (during exam, on stage etc)

暈染.definition: to smudge (become smeared); to smudge (create a blurred effect); shading (wash painting technique)

暈池.definition: to faint in the bathroom (from heat)

暈菜.definition: (dialect) to get confused; to be dumbfounded; to get dizzy

暈血.definition: to feel sick when seeing blood

暈針.definition: to faint during acupuncture or injection

暈高兒.definition: to feel giddy on heights; vertigo
